name: Humans (-1): Glory`s Guardians
description:
2D Drama Narrative game, story starts when Clifford and his sons promise their selves to protect his daughter Glory from outside cruel world....but some event change the fate of whale family

this game will be the first game of series called (Humans Negative) or (Humans -)

In each game of this series, there will be story of a human being, through unique gameplay shows his mind and emotions struggle 

the first game was developed using Unity by sole game designer and developer but using sprites shared in public websites
